title: Heartreach Potion
summaries: The Heartreach Potion is a buff potion which grants the Heartreach buff when consumed. The buff increases the pickup range of life recovery Hearts by 15.625 tiles, from 2.625 tiles to a total of 18.25 tiles. This lasts for 8 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).

This potion can only be crafted with access to a <linked>Crimson</linked> <linked>biome</linked> due to the <linked>Crimson Tigerfish</linked> requirement, but can be also be obtained as a random reward from <linked>fished</linked> <linked>crates</linked> in any world. <linked>Wooden Crates</linked> drop buff potions at a rate of 1 in 7, <linked>Iron</linked> at 1 in 4, and <linked>Golden</linked> at 1 in 3.
